name: Untrashing the Ocean
description:
This is a game about cleaning the sea, made for #TeamSeas movement. Collect the trash and help to clean the ocean!

You can donate do TeamSeas here.

This is my first game i've ever made, hope you enjoy!

How to Play

As a trash can, you need to take trash. Try to take as much as possible and don't let it mess up the environment.

WASD or arrows to move
